00009 EdgeInfo::EdgeInfo(const float weight, const float minSize, const float maxSize) : ComponentInfo(weight) {
00010 
00011         if(minSize < 0) {
00012                 throw std::invalid_argument("Edge min size something less 0");
00013         }
00014         this->minSize = minSize;
00015 
00016         if(maxSize < minSize) {
00017                 throw std::invalid_argument("Edge max size something less Edge min size");
00018         }
00019         this->maxSize = maxSize;
00020 }
00021 
00022 // Retourne le minimum d un edge
00023 const float EdgeInfo::getMinSize() const {
00024         return this->minSize;
00025 }
00026
